full_text:
1 MP: Well, that's....
2 I just knew.
3 MP: Well, this is why. What's happening is that I was made aware of this situation...
4 From my school?
5 MP: I'm not gonna say, okay? I was made aware of this situation. And they look at it like you were taken advantage of. Not that you did anything wrong, okay? Even though you went there willingly. Even though you went there willingly, you were still taken advantage of. Okay? Because you were put into a position that you felt you had no choice. Once you were there, before when you were telling me about how Jeff told you to take off your clothes? You took your pointer and you said he was really stern and you banged your leg, you put the pointer on your leg when you said that. How did you feel when he told you to take your clothes off?
12 I don't know. I didn't know what else to do because I was the only person up there and he's like 45 years old and he has like big muscles, because, I don't know, but I'm pretty sure 45 years old and big muscles, body builder.
16 MP: Okay.
17 So I just felt intimidated because he's guy, first of all, and I'm a girl and I know that Haley was all the way downstairs with the lady and what was Haley going to do to help me all the way upstairs so I just did it.
20 MP: Okay. Now, there's one way I'm a little confused at because you said that, and I'm using your words okay, that he whacked off twice. You said before that he whacked off twice. When did he do that?
23 In between giving him a massage, like when I was giving him a massage, he was
